}}'''Flint''' is a [[character]] in the novels published by [[Max Brooks]].

== Appearance ==
Flint is described as merely a common sheep mob, or at least near identical. Initially, Guy describes Flint to be a black sheep.
== Personality ==
On the surface, Flint appears (and very likely is) a typical sheep mob, displaying no outward intelligence.

They're sentience is also thrown into question, if not demonstrably proven, in the chapter ''Itâ€™s not Failure That Matters, but How You Recover'', where a building Guy constructed is burned to the ground by [[lava]]. Despite the stakes and Guy pleading for he and the other animals to flee, they do not.
